ad_text: Penn Waste Sponsored NOW HIRING– A Credit & Collections Administrator in Manchester, PA! Penn Waste Sponsored WE ARE HIRING Loaders to join our Penn Waste team in Manchester, PA! The Loader position is responsible for helping the garbage truck driver on specified routes to manually collect solid waste and transport it to appropriate disposal sites. Penn Waste has a great working environment, awesome benefits, and we are looking for talented, hard-working individuals to add to our team!
